title: Is the BVRIT college in Narsapur good for an IT branch in placements? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A Thattepally Greeshma Firstly I would say a big YES to your question. Definitely BVRIT narsapur is a very good college for placements. Not only for placements but the college will help you learn a lot of things by giving you many opportunities. There are lot many programs which help individuals to grow their skills. It’s one of the best colleges which will help you in gaining practical knowledge also help in building the bridge between your college and the actual need what an industry requires. I can assure you would get placed if you’re above average student in bvrit with good technical and communication skills. There are lot many trainings are conducted as part of recruitment. You should also put some efforts from your side by showing intrests and learning by attending all the recruitment trainings provided by the college.

IT students are eligible for all the software companies that visit campus. Of course, other branches are also eligible (not for all companies but most of them). Also the ratio of students selected from CSE and IT departments is high, meaning these guys will have an advantage. Coming to numbers, around 90 people from IT department are selected in 2015–16 placement season. Source - http://bvrit.ac.in/index.php/department-placements-ce
